15 Years Doing C++ Standardization Work: A Personal Retrospective - Nevin Liber - CppCon 2025
---

I've been working on C++ standardization for a decade and a half, and have been reflecting on what has been accomplished, increased participation, and why I keep doing it. 
 
 I'll talk about how I got involved with C++, with C++ standardization, the lessons I learned (and am continuing to learn) both participating and chairing, getting proposals through the committee, where we are now (including 3 day old information on C++26), where I think it is heading, and how you can help. 

---

Slides: https://github.com/CppCon/CppCon2025/blob/main/Presentations/15_Years_Doing_Cpp_Standardization_Work.pdf

Work at Hudson River Trading (HRT): https://tinyurl.com/safxfctf
